# Jordan Terry

> Senior Android Engineer at Etsy. 10+ years experience. Speaker. Building mobile products that make the right thing easy.

I'm a Senior Android Engineer currently working at Etsy. I'm passionate about mobile development, modular architecture, and building great user experiences. I regularly speak at conferences and meetups about Android development.
